title: The Triple Fool - the best fools are a little wise

content.prompt: In context, line 22 is best interpreted to mean that

choices.label: wisdom can transcend the pain of love
wisdom can open new avenues of foolishness
only the wisest fool believes in love
fools are often wiser than they appear to be

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
